cd:Record.name: PMAP_SPHR_v1
cd:Record.cd:Description: Polar Multi-Sensor Aerosol Product Specific Record Header (format version 1)

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of scans in the product
Number of valid scans with missing data packets
Number of missing data packets in valid scans
Number of missing scans
Number of scans in Nadir scanning observation mode
Number of scans in North pole scanning observation mode
Number of scans in South pole scanning observation mode
Number of scans in Nadir static observation mode
Number of scans in Other scanning or Other Static observation mode (i.e. sum of N_OTHER_SCAN and N_OTHER_STATIC from level 1b SPHR)
Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band PMD p
Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band PMD s
Number of scans with saturated pixels, band PMD p
Number of scans with saturated pixels, band PMD s
Number of scans with hot pixels, band PMD p
Number of scans with hot pixels, band PMD s
Number of scans in the SAA
Number of scans with sunglint danger
Number of scans with rainbow danger
Number of scans with possible mismatch between observation mode and geolocation
